cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchikomu

sentence.kanji: 彼は研究に打ち込んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kenkyuu ni uchikonde imasu
sentence.english: He is dedicated to his research.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuse

sentence.kanji: 彼は出世するタイプだな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shuse suru taipu da na
sentence.english: He is the successful type.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iede

sentence.kanji: 彼の息子が家出したそうよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no musuko ga iede shita sou yo
sentence.english: I hear that his son left home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's deiri

sentence.kanji: 彼の家は人の出入りが多いね。
sentence.romaji: kare no ie ha hito no deiri ga ooi ne
sentence.english: There are a lot of people going in and out his house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's midashi

sentence.kanji: 新聞の見出しが彼の目を引いたんだ。
sentence.romaji: shinbun no midashi ga kare no me wo hiita n da
sentence.english: The newspaper article drew his attention.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's deau

sentence.kanji: アメリカで彼女と出会いました。
sentence.romaji: amerika de kanojo to deaimashita。
sentence.english: I met her in the United States.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukeireru

sentence.kanji: 私は彼の意見を受け入れました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no iken wo ukeiremashita
sentence.english: I accepted his opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mochikomu

sentence.kanji: 機内に荷物を持ち込んだの。
sentence.romaji: kinai ni nimotsu wo mochikonda no
sentence.english: We carried our luggage onto the plane.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouritsu

sentence.kanji: 駅前に公立の図書館があるよ。
sentence.romaji: ekimae ni kouritsu no toshokan ga aru yo
sentence.english: There is a public library opposite the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teishutsu

sentence.kanji: 課題は7月5日までに提出してください。
sentence.romaji: kadai ha 7 gatsu 5 ka made ni teishutsu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please submit your assignment by July 5.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinyuu

sentence.kanji: こちらにお名前をご記入ください。
sentence.romaji: kochira ni onamae wo go kinyuu kudasai
sentence.english: Please fill in your name here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuujou

sentence.kanji: 選手の入場です。
sentence.romaji: senshu no nyuujou desu
sentence.english: The athletes will march in.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinshutsu

sentence.kanji: 大手チェーン店が進出している。
sentence.romaji: oote chie-nten ga shinshutsu shite iru
sentence.english: That major store chain is expanding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikomi

sentence.kanji: 3月に大学を卒業の見込みです。
sentence.romaji: 3 gatsu ni daigaku wo sotsugyou no mikomi desu
sentence.english: I expect to graduate from university in March.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は感情を込めてその歌を歌ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanjou wo komete sono uta wo utata no
sentence.english: He sang the song with feeling.

cards.english: make a break for, run off
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigedasu

sentence.kanji: トラがおりから逃げ出しました。
sentence.romaji: tora ga ori kara nigedashimashita
sentence.english: The tiger escaped from the cage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuzusu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は体調を崩しています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha taichou wo kuzushite imasu
sentence.english: She is under the weather.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's deiriguchi

sentence.kanji: 出入り口に車を停めないでください。
sentence.romaji: deiriguchi ni kuruma wo tomenai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't stop the car by the entrance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuukoku

sentence.kanji: 私は留学生として日本に入国しました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryuugakusei toshite nipon ni nyuukoku shimashita
sentence.english: I entered Japan as an international student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatekomu

sentence.kanji: この辺は住宅が立て込んで います。
sentence.romaji: konohen ha juutaku ga tatekonde imasu
sentence.english: This area is crowded with houses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokubou

sentence.kanji: 彼は欲望が強い人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yokubou ga tsuyoi hito desu
sentence.english: He's a person with strong desires.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buntan

sentence.kanji: 私たち夫婦は家事を分担しています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi fuufu ha kaji wo buntan shite imasu
sentence.english: We share the housework in my marriage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hisoka

sentence.kanji: 彼女の誕生日パーティーを密かに計画しています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no tanjoubi pa-tei- wo hisoka ni keikaku shite imasu
sentence.english: We're secretly planning a birthday party for her.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iyoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は仕事に意欲を燃やしています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shigoto ni iyoku wo moyashite imasu
sentence.english: He is very motivated to work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sekitan

sentence.kanji: 小屋に石炭の山があります。
sentence.romaji: koya ni sekitan no yama ga arimasu
sentence.english: There is a mountain of coal in the hut.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iwa

sentence.kanji: あの岩まで泳ごう。
sentence.romaji: ano iwa made oyogou
sentence.english: Let's swim up to that rock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mazushii

sentence.kanji: 彼は貧しい家庭で育ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mazushii katei de sodata n da
sentence.english: He grew up in a poor family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teire

sentence.kanji: 母は庭の手入れをしています。
sentence.romaji: haha ha niwa no teire wo shite imasu
sentence.english: My mother's tending the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suikomu

sentence.kanji: ほこりを吸い込んじゃった。
sentence.romaji: hokori wo suikonjata
sentence.english: I have inhaled some dust.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokeru

sentence.kanji: 暑さでアイスクリームが溶けてしまった。
sentence.romaji: atsusa de aisukuri-mu ga tokete shimata
sentence.english: The ice cream melted in the heat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokasu

sentence.kanji: 春の太陽が雪を溶かしました。
sentence.romaji: haru no taiyou ga yuki wo tokashimashita
sentence.english: The spring sun melted the snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youki

sentence.kanji: 容器のふたはきちんと閉めましょう。
sentence.romaji: youki no futa ha kichinto shimemashou
sentence.english: Be sure to properly close the containers' lids.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haraikomu

sentence.kanji: 授業料を学校に払い込みました。
sentence.romaji: jugyouryou wo gakou ni haraikomimashita
sentence.english: I paid tuition to the school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iidasu

sentence.kanji: 突然何を言い出すのかと思った。
sentence.romaji: totsuzen nani wo iidasu no ka to omota
sentence.english: I wondered what you would say out of the blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koushiki

sentence.kanji: 今後の方針が公式に発表されました。
sentence.romaji: kongo no houshin ga koushiki ni hapyou saremashita
sentence.english: The future policy was officially announced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's demae

sentence.kanji: 寿司の出前を頼んだよ。
sentence.romaji: sushi no demae wo tanonda yo
sentence.english: We ordered some sushi by delivery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tani

sentence.kanji: その村は深い谷にあるの。
sentence.romaji: sono mura ha fukai tani ni aru no
sentence.english: The village is in a deep valley.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisuiyoku

sentence.kanji: 夏休みには海水浴に行きます。
sentence.romaji: natsuyasumi ni ha kaisuiyoku ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I go to swim in the sea during the summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuuyoku

sentence.kanji: 私は毎日寝る前に入浴します。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mainichi neru mae ni nyuuyoku shimasu
sentence.english: I take a bath every day before I go to bed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sou

sentence.kanji: 川に沿って歩いたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kawa ni sote aruita n da
sentence.english: I walked along the river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sashidasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は握手をしようと手を差し出したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha akushu wo shiyouto te wo sashidashita no
sentence.english: He put out his hand to shake hands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kazan

sentence.kanji: 島で火山が噴火したよ。
sentence.romaji: shima de kazan ga funka shita yo
sentence.english: The volcano erupted on the island.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyuiri

sentence.kanji: 梅雨入りは6月17日でした。
sentence.romaji: tsuyuiri ha 6 gatsu 17 nichi deshita
sentence.english: The rainy season started on June 17.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touge

sentence.kanji: この峠を越えると村があります。
sentence.romaji: kono touge wo koeru to mura ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a village if you go over this mountain pass.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuzureru

sentence.kanji: 大雨で崖が崩れたね。
sentence.romaji: ooame de gake ga kuzureta ne
sentence.english: The cliff collapsed because of the downpour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gake

sentence.kanji: 大雨で崖が崩れたんだ。
sentence.romaji: ooame de gake ga kuzureta n da
sentence.english: The cliff collapsed because of the downpour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arashi

sentence.kanji: 嵐で庭の木が折れたよ。
sentence.romaji: arashi de niwa no ki ga oreta yo 。
sentence.english: The tree in the garden snapped in the storm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoikomu

sentence.kanji: 彼は騙されたと思い込んでいるようです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha damasareta to omoikonde iru you desu
sentence.english: He's apparently convinced he's been cheated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otoko

sentence.kanji: 男の人が私たちに話しかけた。
sentence.romaji: otoko no hito ga watashitachi ni hanashikaketa
sentence.english: This guy began talking to us.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's matsu

sentence.kanji: あなたが来るのを待っています。
sentence.romaji: anata ga kuru no wo mate imasu
sentence.english: I am waiting for you to come.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toru

sentence.kanji: テストでいい点を取った。
sentence.romaji: tesuto de ii ten wo tota
sentence.english: I got a good grade on the test.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kau

sentence.kanji: 郵便局で切手を買いました。
sentence.romaji: yuubinkyoku de kite wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a stamp at the post office.
